variables.documentation01: This sub-template drives the Azure Search which is used as the access-point for other mahara VM's
variables.documentation02: It expects certain values in the 'common' datastructure.
variables.documentation03: azureSearchName			- the name of the Azure Search.
variables.documentation04: azureSearchSku			- the level of Azure Search service.
variables.documentation06: azureSearchReplicaCount		- number of Azure Search replicas.
variables.documentation07: azureSearchPartitionCount	- number of Azure Search partitions.
variables.documentation08: azureSearchHostingMode		- the type of Azure Search hosting mode.
